Title: Relates to the designation and rights of legislative employees; repealer
Summary: Relates to the designation and rights of legislative employees; designates employees of the legislature as being in the exempt class of classified service and includes the legislature as a public employer.
LawCode: Amd §715, Lab L; rpld §35 sub (c), amd §§41 & 201, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the civil service law, in relation to the designation and rights of employees of the legislature; and to repeal certain provisions of the civil service law relating thereto
